channel.title: Python on open-archaeo
channel.description: Recent content in Python on open-archaeo

item.title: AntCaller
item.description: SNP calling and genotyping for damaged DNA.

item.title: AuthentiCT
item.description: Estimate the proportion of present-day DNA contamination in ancient DNA datasets generated from single-stranded libraries.

item.title: CeraMatch
item.description: Visual shape-matching of ceramics profiles.

item.title: chrono_spatial_modelling
item.description: This is an example implementation of chrono-spatial modelling of settlement activities.

item.title: clustering_14C
item.description: A python implementation of the method of clustering radiocarbon dates in order to determine whether they represent separate events, or phases in time

item.title: demjanp
item.description: Radiocarbon Dating Resolution Calculator

item.title: epiPALEOMIX
item.description: A fast, accurate, and automatic pipeline for generating nucleosome and methylation maps from high throughput sequencing data underlying ancient samples.

item.title: hapROH
item.description: Software to call ROH from ancient and present-day DNA using reference haplotypes.

item.title: Harris-matrix-legacy
item.description: Create a Harris Matrix from archaeological stratigraphy data using Python and Graphviz.

item.title: harris2graph
item.description: harris2graph is a script to help migrate data from the LST file format used by the BASP Harris, Stratify and ArchEd packages into modern graph file formats.

item.title: IOSACal
item.description: IOSACal is an open source tool for radiocarbon calibration

item.title: kotyle
item.description: Kotyle (from the ancient greek ≈í‚à´≈í√∏≈ì√ë≈ì√ß≈í¬™≈í‚àë, ‚Äö√Ñ√∫measure of capacity‚Äö√Ñ√π, ‚Äö√Ñ√∫drinking cup‚Äö√Ñ√π) is a software program for calculating the capacity of a ceramic vessel.

item.title: mapDamage
item.description: Tracking and quantifying damage patterns in ancient DNA sequences.

item.title: murature
item.description: This Python library was written as an help for the study of stone walls, mainly through the quantitative analysis of spatial dimensions of stones.

item.title: paleomix
item.description: Pipelines and tools for the processing of ancient and modern High-Throughput Sequencing (HTS) data.

item.title: PMDtools
item.description: Compute postmortem damage patterns and decontaminate ancient genomes.

item.title: postAAR-python
item.description: Python implementation of postAAR

item.title: PyXRF
item.description: PyXRF is a python-based sophisticated fluorescence analysis package for fitting and visualizing X-ray fluorescence data

item.title: READ
item.description: A method to infer the degree of relationship (up to second degree, i.e. nephew/niece-uncle/aunt, grandparent-grandchild or half-siblings) for a pair of low-coverage individuals.

item.title: scikit-beam
item.description: Data analysis tools for X-Ray, Neutron and Electron sciences

item.title: Sex.DetERRmine
item.description: Calculate the relative coverage of X and Y chromosomes, and their associated error bars, from the depth of coverage at specified SNPs.

item.title: SPARSE
item.description: Indexes >100,000 reference genomes in public databases in to hierarchical clusters and uses it to predict origins of metagenomic reads.

item.title: synthkat
item.description: Synthetic Categories for Archaeological Vessel Comparison.

item.title: totalstation-tools
item.description: Tools to use and manipulate total station data
